kv12.3:1.3: Sukhavedaniyo dukkhavedaniyo adukkhamasukhavedaniyo, sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto, dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto, phassena sampayutto, vedanāya sampayutto, saññāya sampayutto, cetanāya sampayutto, cittena sampayutto, sārammaṇo;
kv12.3:1.4: atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv12.3:1.6: nanu na sukhavedaniyo na dukkhavedaniyo …pe… anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.3:1.8: Hañci na sukhavedaniyo …pe… anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.3:2.1: Phasso vipāko, phasso sukhavedaniyo …pe… sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.3:2.3: Saddo vipāko, saddo sukhavedaniyo …pe… sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.3:3.1: Saddo vipāko, saddo na sukhavedaniyo …pe… anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.3:3.3: Phasso vipāko, phasso na sukhavedaniyo, na dukkhavedaniyo …pe… anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.3:4.5: “so tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā brahmassaro hoti karavikabhāṇī”ti.
